Title: Images
Actors: Susannah York, Rene Auberjonois, Marcel Bozzuffi, Hugh Millais
Plot: Like Polanski's heroine in Repulsion, Susannah York's character is one that is seemingly haunted by memories of undisclosed magnitude. These memories are perhaps rooted in some sort of past sexual turmoil that causes York's character to see men as inherently the same.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
